skills.name: Cross Attack
skills.description: Hits the enemy with an Energy blast and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 20% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%

Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Tectonic Shift
skills.description: Strikes an enemy with an attack strong enough to split the Earth. Ignores the enemy's Defense to inflict significant damage.

skill_effect.name: Ignore DEF
skill_effect.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

skills.name: Mystical Blood Transfusion
skills.description: Removes all Harmful Effects on an ally target and also evens the HP ratio of you and the ally target. After that, both monsters are healed by 25% of their MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Equalizes the HP percentage of the current monster and the target. ">Life Share</mark>
